answers.answer: HiThanks for writing to the forum!The symptoms are more indicative of a hypothyroid state. Diabetes too should be ruled out. If you have accompanying fever, then it could be viral in origin. Do get your thyroid tested along with thyroid antibody test. Get your sugar tested.Hope this helps. Do let me know if there is any thing else and keep me posted. Take care!

question: I have a headache(motrin has no effect) ,body aches,and feel cod all over. What might those symptons indicate?
title: aches
